thread.title: John Klier Named Head of Chemical Engineering Department (University of Massachusetts Amherst)
thread.title_full: John Klier Named Head of Chemical Engineering Department (University of Massachusetts Amherst) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: John Klier Named Head of Chemical Engineering Department (University of Massachusetts Amherst)
text: ( Source : University of Massachusetts Amherst ) The College of Engineering has named John Klier to head its department of chemical engineering, effective Oct. 25 . A member of the National Academy of Engineering , Klier joins the university
